name: Template
info: Always use this template
content:
<!doctype html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
  <meta charset="UTF-8">
  <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, user-scalable=no, initial-scale=1.0, maximum-scale=1.0, minimum-scale=1.0">
  <meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="ie=edge">
  <title>TITLE</title>
  <link rel="stylesheet" href="css/style.css">
</head>
<body>
  CONTENT
  <script src="js/main.js"></script>
</body>
</html>

name: External CSS
info: Link an external css file

name: External Script
info: Link an external js file

name: Element Class
info: A non-unique class for an element, used to target multiple elements in css
content: Can be used in css and js to select multiple elements

name: Element Id
info: A unique id for an element
content: Can be used in css and js to select one specific element

name: Div
info: A container for multiple child elements

name: Span
info: A div like element for inline text

name: Heading
info: Display titles, subtitles...
content:
Most important heading

Second most important heading

Third most important heading

Fourth most important heading

Fifth most important heading
Sixt most important heading

name: Paragraph
info: This tag is ment for longer pieces of text

name: Anchor
info: This tag links to an other page
content: Go to page 2 in the same window Go to page 2 in a new window

name: Unorderd list
info: This makes an unordered list, use this when making menus

name: Orderd list
info: This makes an orderd list with auto incrementing numbers

name: Picture
info: Load a picture into an HTML page.

name: Header
info: This indicates the top of a page

name: Main
info: This indicates the main section of a page
content: <main>Main section of the page, contains the general content</main>

name: Footer
info: This indicates the foot section of a page

name: Navigation
info: This indicates the navigation of a page
content: <nav>Add an unorderd list here for navigation</nav>

name: Bold
info: Prints text bold

name: Cursive
info: Prints text cursive

name: Devider
info: Draws a horizontal ruler over the width of it's parent element

name: Input
info: Let's users input text
content:
<input type="text">
<!-- Type can also be 'email', 'password', 'radio', 'checkbox', 'button', 'submit', 'reset' and more... -->

name: Form
info: Groups inputs together. When a form is submitted, all inputs within this form will be sent.
content:
<!-- Actions defines the script that handels the form submit (usually a PHP script) -->
<form action="/serverscript.php" method="POST" onsubmit="submitForm()"> 
  <label for="firstnameInput">Firstname: </label>
  <input type="text" name="firstname" id="firstnameInput">
  <label for="lastnameInput">Lastname: </label>
  <input type="text" name="lastname" id="lastnameInput">

  <input type="radio" name="gender" value="male" checked> Male
  <input type="radio" name="gender" value="female"> Female
  <input type="radio" name="gender" value="other"> Other

  <!-- Submit the form -->
  <input type="submit" value="Submit"/>
</form>

<!-- Handle the form with js (optional) -->
<script>
  function submitForm (e) {
    // Stop the form from submitting to serverscript.php
    e.preventDefault();
    // Handle form data here
  }
</script>

name: Table
info: This displays a table.
content:
Company Contact Country
Alfreds Futterkiste Maria Anders Germany
Centro comercial Moctezuma Francisco Chang Mexico
Ernst Handel Roland Mendel Austria
